title: ‘I just somersaulted’: Sepp Kuss tumbles out of Tour de France top 10 after crash
content:
It's mission accomplished for the American climbing star with Jumbo-Visma poised to win the yellow jersey Sunday in Paris: 'I was happy to be there in a lot of key moments.'

Read the full article at ‘I just somersaulted’: Sepp Kuss tumbles out of Tour de France top 10 after crash on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
